$comment: Based, with some modification & customization, on https://json.schemastore.org/catalog-info.json.
description:
An API describes an interface that can be exposed by a component. The API can be defined in different formats, like OpenAPI, AsyncAPI, GraphQL, gRPC, or other formats.
More info @ https://techhub.mktp.io/docs/default/system/techhub/catalog-info-entities/api/ .

type.description: The type of the API definition. More info @ https://techhub.mktp.io/docs/default/system/techhub/catalog-info-entities/api/#property-value-restrictions .

lifecycle.description: The lifecycle state of the API. More info @ https://techhub.mktp.io/docs/default/system/techhub/catalog-info-entities/api/#property-value-restrictions .

owner.description:
An entity reference to the owner of the API.
This should usually not be specified because the owner will be automatically determined via this repository's CODEOWNERS file.

system.description: An entity reference to the system that the API belongs to.

anyOf.description: The definition of the API, based on the format defined by the type.
